sentences.en: And if we take this biological view of life and try to live according to the seasons, no one but a conceited fool or an impossible idealist can deny that human life can be lived like a poem.
sentences.cn: 如若我们持此种生物学的观点来看待人生，并尝试依照时节来生活，除了自以为是的傻瓜和令人难以忍受的理想主义者之外，没有人能否认人生的美妙如诗。

sentences.en: Anyone who think that rational knowledge need not be derived from perceptual knowledge is an idealist.
sentences.cn: 任何认为理性知识不必来自感性知识的人是理想主义者.

sentences.en: As an idealist, I know that everyone is different, and there are many reasons why people behave the way they do.
sentences.cn: 作为一个理想主义者，我知道每人都不同，我理解人们的表现都有各自的原因。

sentences.en: Benedetto Croce is an idealist philosopher.
sentences.cn: 克罗齐是一位唯心主义哲学家,其美学具有鲜明的非理性主义倾向.

sentences.en: German idealist philosopher ( 1724 - 1804 ).
sentences.cn: 德国理想主义哲学家.

sentences.en: He is a political pragmatist, not an idealist.
sentences.cn: 他是政治上的实用主义者，而不是理想主义者。

sentences.en: He is not such an idealist that he cannot see the problems.
sentences.cn: 他并非看不见问题的理想主义者。

sentences.en: He was a militant idealist who crusaded against racial bigotry by growing faint in its presence.
sentences.cn: 他还是个富有战斗精神的空想家,他看到种族偏见的现象就要晕倒,以此来表示他的反对.

sentences.en: He's a crank, and a noxious crank. He calls himself an idealist.
sentences.cn: 他是个怪人, 而且还是个极为有害的怪人, 他自称是理想主义者.

sentences.en: I think opportunities for exchange such as this are important because I am an idealist.
sentences.cn: 作为一名理想主义者,我想这种交流是非常重要的.

sentences.en: It is entirely proper to classify Kant as a transcendental idealist.
sentences.cn: 把康德化为先驱的唯心主义者是完全正确的.

sentences.en: It is entirly proper to classify Kant as a transcendental idealist.

sentences.en: Marx referred to all such views as'idealist '.
sentences.cn: 马克思把所有这些观点叫作 “ 唯心主义”.

sentences.en: Metaphysics is part and parcel of the idealist world outlook.
sentences.cn: 形而上学是唯心主义世界观的组成部分.

sentences.en: The idealist withdrew himself, because he could not suffer the jostling of the human crowd.
sentences.cn: 理想主义者自动地逃避生活, 因为他受不了那种人群的竞争挤撞.

sentences.en: The statement comes amid praise for Snowden in the government-controlled media that is describing him as an "idealist" and a "hero".
sentences.cn: 作出这份声明的同时，政府控制的媒体大肆赞扬斯诺登，将其描述为“理想主义者”和“英雄”。

sentences.en: This is a heated debate which involves materialist as opposed to idealist views.
sentences.cn: 这是一场唯物主义与唯心主义的大论战.

sentences.en: This is because there were a lot of them about in histime—and they were almost all the work of hopelessly idealist radicals.
sentences.cn: 这是因为大量的工作占用了他的时间——而这些几乎全部都是没有希望的理想主义的激进分子的工作。

sentences.en: Walter Redlich: I'm proud to be an idealist because it shows that I believe in mankind. That may sound naive but every other belief will lead to destruction.
sentences.cn: 我为成为一个理想主义者而感到自豪，因为那说明我信仰人类。那听起来可能很天真，但是其他别的信仰将会导致毁灭。

sentences.en: You are an idealist likely to have deep spiritual beliefs.
sentences.cn: 你是个理想主义者,可能有着深厚的灵性信仰.
